scenes.background: Bob crosses his arms and says, Fine, no bar. But whats the plan then?
scenes.description: Lets explore Ryans idea of an outdoor activity.

options.text: We can plan a variety of activities to suit everyone's interests.
options.analysis: You showed a balanced emotional intelligence by proposing diverse activities, but self-regulation was lower.

options.text: An outdoor activity can be refreshing, and we can ensure it's not too strenuous.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the suggestion, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy was lower.

options.text: Perhaps a mix of outdoor and indoor activities would cater to everyone's preferences.
options.analysis: You showed empathy and consideration by proposing a mix of activities, but social skill was lower.
